technologySection.title: Advanced Technologies
technologySection.description: At Dion Hair Clinic, we utilize the most advanced technologies and techniques to ensure optimal results for our patients.

technologies.title: FUE (Follicular Unit Extraction)
technologies.description: Minimally invasive technique for harvesting individual hair follicles with minimal scarring and faster recovery.

technologies.title: DHI (Direct Hair Implantation)
technologies.description: Advanced implantation method using specialized tools for precise placement and natural-looking results.

technologies.title: Sapphire FUE
technologies.description: Enhanced FUE technique using sapphire blades for more precise incisions and better healing.

technologies.title: PRP Therapy
technologies.description: Platelet-rich plasma treatment to stimulate hair growth and improve transplant results.

technologies.title: Digital Hair Analysis
technologies.description: Advanced imaging technology for precise diagnosis and treatment planning.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.description: Find answers to common questions about our clinic and procedures.

faqs.question: What makes Dion Hair Clinic different from other clinics?
faqs.answer: Dion Hair Clinic combines medical expertise, cutting-edge technology, and personalized care to deliver exceptional results. Our holistic approach addresses not just the symptoms but the underlying causes of hair loss, ensuring long-lasting results.

faqs.question: How experienced is your medical team?
faqs.answer: Our medical team consists of specialists with extensive training and experience in hair restoration. Our lead surgeons have performed thousands of successful procedures and regularly participate in advanced training to stay at the forefront of the field.

faqs.question: What types of procedures do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer a comprehensive range of hair restoration procedures, including FUE and DHI hair transplantation, beard and eyebrow transplantation, PRP therapy, mesotherapy, and non-surgical treatments for hair loss.

faqs.question: How do I know if I'm a good candidate for a hair transplant?
faqs.answer: The best way to determine if you're a good candidate is through a personal consultation. Factors such as the extent of hair loss, donor hair availability, and overall health are considered. We offer free consultations to assess your specific situation.

faqs.question: What is the recovery time after a hair transplant?
faqs.answer: Most patients can return to light activities within 2-3 days and resume normal activities within 7-10 days. The transplanted area will heal within 1-2 weeks, though the full results of the transplant will develop over several months.

faqs.question: Do you offer financing options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer various financing options to make our treatments accessible. Our patient coordinators can provide detailed information about payment plans during your consultation.
